name: Jetpack vs Jetpack
description:
Jetpack vs Jetpack is a 2D Multiplayer Arena Shooter with Jetpacks strapped on everyone.

Experience the reality-bending physics along with gun-blazing action as you shoot down your enemies while going at incredibly high speeds. Gain speed, rebound from walls, do anything to survive as you enter a world of deathly thrill-seeking.

Demo is now available!

Demo only includes a single test map. Almost all art is placeholder and doesn't represent the final game.
